item.title: Résumé with AltaCV and LaTeX
item.description: I had to write a résumé and searched the web for solutions that looked good. Quickly found the AltaCV template that liantze have made and I think it looks really good! This is my notes on how I got the template to compile. Clone AltaCV template Navigate to the GitHub repo AltaCV and clone it to your local system. In this example I have cloned it to ~/git.
